task.title: Scaling an Image
task.shortdesc: You can scale your image by dragging the corner of your frame. However, there are other methods available to scaling images in Figma.

step.cmd: Press the K hot key to access the scaling tool.
Adjust Height and Width to your liking.
Switch back to the move tool by selecting the **"M"** hotkey.

info.note: Scaling your image too dramatically may alter the image quality.
